title: Chat Sound Isn't Working....again
body:
my chat sound (not in game messages) aren't working again....i posted before about this and repairing it fixed it for a little while but a week later its back to going mute after a while :/ what should i try now?

my first post: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/jerHUoim-chat-sound?comment=00000000

replies.body: Sorry to hear this is still happening.  :(  Double check your client settings, specifically client volume, to make sure volume is enabled.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you directly to see what's going on.  We'll see you there!
yep i checked my client volume and it's enabled and all on 100%. thanks, i've submitted a ticket with logs :)
